p: ME and HH designed the study. ME purified and characterized the SP-D preparations, and wrote the manuscript. MLBH, GR, MW, and KH designed and executed the in vitro virus experiments. MR assisted in designing iSP-D. MH assisted in expression of recombinant proteins. PK and MT performed the immunohistochemical experiments. MH performed the AFM experiments. TM and AH designed and executed the in vivo experiments. HH, GR, KH, and AH reviewed and improved the manuscript. HH supervised the study.
